author: LegoFrancis
title: Coolest Racer of 2001-2002
review:
I bought this set when I came to Legoland Windsor and was fascinated at the glow in the dark racer...

Pros...
- Glow in the dark racer better than most of today's glow in the dark pieces.
- Nice ghost symbol.

Cons...
- Same car...



I give it 4.75
